button.detail.description: Button text used to view the details of the site's referral history.

button.withdrawal.description: Button text used to withdraw the earnings from the site's referrals.

button.query.description: Button text used to query the earnings from the site's referrals.

field.id.description: A unique identifier for the referral, which refers to the referrals of the API service website.

field.percentage.description: The percentage of referral earnings calculated based on the order amount.

field.price.description: The order amount used to calculate referral earnings.

field.reward.description: The referral earnings calculated based on the order amount and referral earnings percentage.

field.userId.description: The unique identifier for the user, which refers to the users of the API service website.

field.userEmail.description: The email address of the user.

field.createdAt.description: The time when the referral was created.

field.level.description: The level of the referral used to calculate referral earnings.

field.threshold.description: The threshold for referral earnings used for withdrawing referral earnings.

field.inviteeId.description: The unique identifier for the inviter, which refers to the person who invited the invitee to the API service website.

field.isVerified.description: A flag indicating whether the referral user has passed the verification of real information.

message.deltaPriceForNextLevel.description: The difference between the current order amount and the threshold for the next level.

message.developingWithDrawal.message: Please join to add customer service for processing withdrawals; withdrawals will incur relevant income tax.
message.developingWithDrawal.description: A message indicating that the withdrawal feature is under development.

message.technicalDetail.description: Implementation details of the referral system.

message.distributionQrDescription.message: Referral QR Code (same as link content)
message.distributionQrDescription.description: Description of the referral QR code.

message.distributionLink.description: A referral link used to bind customers as downline customers.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: A message indicating that the referral information has been successfully updated.

message.distributionLinkDescription.message: If a customer registers on this platform through this link or QR code, they will be permanently bound as your downline customer, and all purchases made by the customer on this platform will be returned to your account based on the current distribution ratio.

message.distributionLinkDescription2.message: This link contains your user ID. When the customer opens the link, your user ID will be recorded in the customer's browser as Cookies, valid for seven days. Within seven days, if the customer registers on this platform by scanning the code, your user ID will be uploaded to the registration server along with the Cookies, and the customer can be bound as your downline customer.

title.price.description: The total amount of referral orders used to calculate referral earnings.

title.reward.description: The total referral reward calculated based on the order amount and referral earnings percentage.

title.level.description: The referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.percentage.description: The referral earnings percentage used to calculate referral earnings.

title.currentLevel.description: The current referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.nextLevel.description: The next referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.currentPercentage.description: The current referral earnings percentage used to calculate referral earnings.

title.nextPercentage.description: The referral earnings percentage for the next level, used to calculate referral earnings.

title.levelInfo.description: Information about the referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.distributionLink.description: A referral link used to bind customers as downline customers.

title.inviteesCount.description: The total number of invitors used for calculating referral earnings.
